askYesNoQuestion

public boolean askYesNoQuestion(java.lang.String question)
Ask a question and prompt with Yes and No buttons. Return true if user selects Yes; false otherwise.

Specified by:
askYesNoQuestion in interface UserInterface
Parameters:

Returns:
